<title level="1" right="Focus 6" pfs="Standard">[Life-Giving Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=757)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 232 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Life](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You transcend your physical form, becoming a beacon of healing energy. Your body exudes bright light like a torch. You gain resistance 5 to precision damage and weakness 5 to negative damage, and your unarmed Strikes deal an extra 1d4 positive damage.

 You can touch a living creature with an Interact action to restore 6d8 Hit Points to it, and when a creature touches you with an Interact action you can allow it to gain the same healing; either way, the creature becomes temporarily immune to _life-giving form's_ healing for 1 minute. This is a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) effect. You can't heal yourself with _life-giving form_. A creature harmed by positive damage (such as an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160)) that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon instead takes 3d4 positive damage, and it doesn't become temporarily immune.

 You can Dismiss this spell.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the Hit Points restored with an Interact action by 1d8, the positive damage by 1, and the resistance and weakness by 1.
name: Life-Giving Form
